features.title: Simple and Free to Use
features.description: CantoTone Translator lets you explore Cantonese without a hitch. Enjoy effortless translations without hidden costs or complicated setups. Dive into a seamless experience right away.

features.title: Accurate Data
features.description: Our smart detection ensures over 90% accuracy in identifying languages and translating them. Whether it's text, audio, or images, CantoTone delivers reliable results every time.

features.title: Data Privacy and Security
features.description: Your data is yours alone. We prioritize privacy by not storing any user data, ensuring your translations remain confidential and secure across all platforms.

features.title: AI Understands Context
features.description: Our AI goes beyond basic translations, grasping context and slang. This means better, more natural translations that respect the nuances of Cantonese language and culture.
